website_summaries.verdict: If you prefer a flower vase that could be described as artistic-looking instead of extravagant, we think you'll enjoy the aesthetics of this quality Lenox vase.
pros: Differs from other crystal vases on our list for the smooth finish and color patterns that give it an artsy appearance
Some owners brag about how nice it looks with brightly colored blooms like roses
Lead-free crystal is thick and strong
10-inch size works well for longer stems
cons: Although rare, some vases were slightly misshapen
Opening is a bit more narrow than some competitors

customer_reviews.title: Much better looking in person than online
customer_reviews.text: Much better looking in person than online. It is a true beach stule vase with sand type colors and patterns. Advertised as tulips but purchased for our 15th anniversary which is a crystal anniversary. Looked great with roses. Almost half the cost of another retailer that rhymes with Tracy's. Shipped fast and came in the Lennox box just as it would from any retailer. Recommended for a gift, beach theme decorating or just because.
customer_reviews.author: Bovineplane

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS VASE
customer_reviews.text: Really nice vase and because it swirls with beigy brownish tones to blackish grayish tones, you can kind of get 2 colors. Presently on my mantle the blackish-grayish swirls are on the outside facing great room but will be turning it around to pick up the more brownish side for fall. Looks really good on my mantle which is not very wide and fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for my daughter in law and I was very pleased with the color, quality and overall design. Much prettier than the picture on the site. Only suitable for certain color flowers. I wouldn't choose anything with a lot of pink. I went by another buyer's photo which appeared to have a little teal mixed in but the one I received is totally sand colored.
customer_reviews.author: Joany A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I found this treasure to go with the new countertop in our remodeled bathroom. Not only was it the exact colors shown online but it was on sale. This was not a disappointment when I received it with respect to colors and quality. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Constant Reader

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, good size
customer_reviews.text: The product is the perfect size and coloration for my application. The only thing that was a little disappointing is that it is not transparent, i.e., the inside is milk white. The illustration gave me the impression that it was transparent with the brown, black and gray swirling mixed in. It's not a deal breaker, just not exactly like I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Scooterman

customer_reviews.title: It's unique and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This vase made the perfect fit in our home. It's beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer SDP

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Just redid my kitchen and this vase ties everything together. It's bigger than I thought but looks gorgeous on my table. I bought some artificial roses and I love the way it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie L.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Vase
customer_reviews.text: This high quality, sturdy and unique vase is absolutely beautiful. It arrived in a timely manner, has a beautiful, unique combination of colors and looks amazing on my Dining Room table. My only MINOR complaint is that it is smaller than expected. It certainly is true to dimensions but appears a little slight in size. Truthfully, though, overall it is a stunning piece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not bad BUT....
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like them, as I bought 2- but the more I looked at them the more they looked like something you would find at TJ maxx for 15 bucks - I sent them back
customer_reviews.author: zeb

customer_reviews.title: I love this Lenox Seaview Sand Tulip Vase
customer_reviews.text: It was meant to be the centerpiece on my living room cocktail table My living room is traditional; and I was disappointed that it didn't WORK there, as It is meant for a more contemporary or modern setting! Regrettably, had to send it back! I would definitely recommend it for a modern or contemporary setting - it's beautiful, like a work of art!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: misshaped
customer_reviews.text: The piece I received was not round at the top which makes it look weird. Colors were as advertised, other than that it is just a vase
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Vase
customer_reviews.text: Great style... not too contemporary but looks sleek and elegant. Vase is much higher priced on other websites so it was a great buy. Love this vase!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Arch

customer_reviews.title: Future gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift from Me to Me! I’m planning to relocate & this is the perfect item for an inviting home setting
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn A C Williams

customer_reviews.title: A Mother’s Successful Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 of these. I was told it was the best gift I’ve given my grown children.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I got the brown vase and let me tell you, it's GORGEOUS! So glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like photo, a lovely vase with rich colors
customer_reviews.author: marcia spinner

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavy great looking
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for my wife. She loves it and I think it looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: WHITECAPS

customer_reviews.title: Nice weighted base, won't tip over easily
customer_reviews.text: I love the mixed colors, one doesn't over power the other, nice to decorate a room.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Beauty all around
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't have asked for a better or more complimentary piece. From the design, weight and look it was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Mark I

customer_reviews.title: The answer is NO
customer_reviews.text: Kidding. Have to be kidding. Looks nothing like preview. Returning (the 7th+ Amazon product I've returned this year).
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Vases are gorgeous and better than I thought they would be.
customer_reviews.author: Molli b

customer_reviews.title: My Mom loves this vase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vase as a Mother’s Day gift hoping it would match my moms table and chairs. It matches great and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Very Impresssive!
customer_reviews.text: The wife was very happy with this Mother;s Day gift! Delivery was quick and the choice was impeccable. Thank you Amazon! It coes look much better in person.
customer_reviews.author: Author , Writer

customer_reviews.title: Deffective vase.
customer_reviews.text: Deffective vase. The base is not straight and the vase wobbles. Returned for replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Leonid Naishtot

customer_reviews.title: Lenox Masterpiece Small Flower Vase
customer_reviews.text: I love it, my sister does, too. Of all the Lenox products I have, this is my favorite!! It is just like the picture showed. No disappointment at all. Service was wonderful. The vase came in a couple of days, it was in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful vase. Looks expensive.  Worth the value.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful vase. Gave as a wedding gift. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Colors are gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant buying this vase as it wasn't my first choice of colors for a wedding gift. When I read the reviews how beautiful the colors were, especially the way the light hits it, I took a chance. It was more beautiful than I imagined and the bride and even the groom loved it so much!! I highly recommend this vase-it's gorgeous and a perfect size for a bouquet of flowers.
customer_reviews.author: Boston Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great vase
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Sand Tulip along with the Novia style and I love them both. They are both high quality vases and enhance the decor of just about any room. Lenox did a nice job with the engineering and design. No problem holding a dozen flowers. The Sand one has a brown tone and looks very similar to the picture. The Novia has a purple shading.
customer_reviews.author: William Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Delicate and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These petite vases are beautiful. The creamy white glossy finish embossed with a delicate pattern look well with my other Lenox pieces that I like to collect. They are just the right size for a few flower stems from the garden.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly W.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lenox Vase
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful milk white and purple vase. Not to small or large. It states that it is non lead crystal, but it does not look like crystal and the box did not mention that it is made of crystal, yet It is still very nice. Hand wash and handle with care.
customer_reviews.author: Bertha Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Granite Countertop Vase
customer_reviews.text: Love this beautiful Lenox vase. While it does not have as much brown as I had hoped, it looks beautiful on my new granite countertop. It arrived quickly, in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Debbers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Craftspersonship
customer_reviews.text: This vase can stand alone and looks great . Personally I dont care for cut flowers or synthetic plants . This vase looks great as is.
customer_reviews.author: darkhorse

customer_reviews.title: A perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my son's and daughter-in-law's 15th wedding anniversary. It matched their decor perfectly and was a beautiful addition to their home.
customer_reviews.author: Nelv

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The vase is much prettier than the picture. Very charming
customer_reviews.author: Laura Wahlberg

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful vase!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be bigger, but still is a beautiful vase!!
customer_reviews.author: One more customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Even more attractive than the picture. Even better, heavily bottom weighted, so it will never tip! Really like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful vase. Heavy and good quality. Wouldn’thesitate To give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Anita M. Dube

customer_reviews.title: Came  in nice  lenox box
customer_reviews.text: I sm happy with purchase. Plan to give it as a wedding gift
customer_reviews.author: amygrimes

customer_reviews.title: Pretty colors
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for Christmas she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Margm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful vase and I will cherish it for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Kaplan

product_meta.title: Lenox 871430 Seaview Sand 10" Tulip Vase, 4.25 LB, Taupe/Grey
product_meta.description: Color:Taupe / GreyIn the swirling patterns and colors of a sand Storm, the elegant and unique Seaview sand 10 inch tulip vase adds depth and beauty to any decor. With or without flowers, this fashionable vase is a sophisticated design accent. Makes an impressive gift.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars162 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: For your peace of mind, all lenox branded products
